fabricator.title: Fabricator
fabricator.info: Can be upgraded to summon drones from defeated enemies.

chrono.title: Chrono Defibrilator
chrono.info: Projectiles explode in AoE and slow.

necroSummon.desc: 10% chance to raise a skeleton when killing an enemy

necroMastery.desc: +20% Range and projectiles pierce one additional enemy

bloodCore.desc: Increase max Core HP by 20% and heal 30 HP

bloodHarvest.desc: Gain 25% more Blood Shards from enemies

bloodRegeneration.desc: All healing effects are 25% more effective

essenceOverflow.desc: Gain 10% more Essence when above 50% Core HP

darkResilience.desc: Towers take 20% less damage from enemy abilities
